devdoc.author: @psychoplasma
devdoc.details: Responsible for user profile creation/modification and CryptoKitties registration/removal under existing profiles. This contract keeps the registered CryptoKitties, SuperDAO Tokens and KittieFight Tokens. Therefore before user creating a profile or any kind of interaction with the whole system, required approvals for both CryptoKitties and ERC20 tokens should be given to this contarct in advance.

exchangeTokensForEth(address,uint256).details: Exchange integration to exchange KTY for ETHCan be called only through Proxy contract

initialize().details: Sets related database contracts and tokens ProfileDB, RoleDB, CryptoKitties, KittieFightToken, SuperDAOTokenCan be called only by the owner of this contract

isRegistered(address).details: Checks whether there is a profile on ProfileDB with the given address.
isRegistered(address).return: bool true if there is a registered profile with the given address, false otherwise.

lockTokens(address,uint256).details: Locks KittieFight tokens to this contract and saves the locked amount on ProfileDB under account's profile.Can be called only through Proxy contract

params.account: address Address of the user whose tokens will be locked
params.amount: uint256 Amount of KittieFight tokens to be locked

register().details: Creates a new profile with the given address in ProfileDB and sets its role to `bettor` by default.Can be called only through Proxy contract

releaseTokens(address,uint256).details: Releases KittieFight tokens from this contract to `account`. Does not allow to release an amount more than the locked amount. Updates the locked amount on ProfileDB accordingly after release.Can be called only through Proxy contract

params.account: address Address of the user whose tokens will be released
params.amount: uint256 Amount of KittieFight tokens to be released

sendTokensTo(address,address,uint256).details: Sends tokens to another addressCan be called only through Proxy contract

stakeSuperDAO(address,uint256).details: Stakes SuperDAO tokens to this contract and saves the stake amount and staking status on ProfileDB.Can be called only through Proxy contract

params.account: address Address of the user who is staking
params.amount: uint256 Amount of SuperDAO tokens to be staked

verifyAccount(uint256).details: Validates the account with the provided civic id so that the account can be eligible to list kitties.Can be called only through Proxy contract

params.civicId: uint256 Civic id to validate the account

devdoc.title: Register
